onlineAddresses.caption: Who, What, Where, When, and Why | Damon and Jo
HOW TO LEARN A LANGUAGE AT HOME

• Damon and Jo are travel experts, authors, digital content creators and all around entrepreneurs.
  • Today, the duo boasts a following of over 2 million followers across their combined channels, and are in production on their Facebook Watch series Damn Millennials.
  • They recently released their first e-book Woke amongst running a successful YouTube channel and travel site titled Shut Up and Go.

speakerBiography.text:
Damon and Jo are travel experts, authors, digital content creators and all around entrepreneurs. The duo, who have always referred to each other as “eternal business partners,” met the summer before entering college and bonded over their love for travel and adventure. The young entrepreneurs began creating content during college while they were studying abroad in Paris, by showcasing their adventures and experiences on Facebook they found an untapped market to explore. Today, the duo boasts a following of over 2 million followers across their combined channels, are in production on their Facebook Watch series Damn Millennials and recently released their first e-book Woke amongst running a successful YouTube channel and travel site titled Shut Up and Go.

Forbes recently labeled Damon and Jo’s YouTube channel a “channel with substance,” by posting videos 4 times a week in English, Portuguese, French and occasionally Spanish, German or Italian, the duo have seen a tremendous amount of growth, their channel counts over 48 million views and over 1 Million subscribers.

Coming from slightly different upbringings, Damon and Jo bring their differences together and create a relatable and inspiring brand. Damon was raised in a traditional American family from a trailer park in Indiana while Jo moved to the US from Rio, Brazil at the age of 5 and became a member of the first colored family in a picturesque town in Connecticut. Both always felt a motivation to get out and experience life while exploring and they took every opportunity they could find during their up-bringing to make it happen.

The duo currently reside in Los Angeles but travel constantly.
